about_the_game:
Nelumbra is a 2.5D roguelite time-survival game. You embody the Light Bearer, a savior trying to survive throughout timeloops to discover about its own fate. Survive relentless celestial hordes and bosses, discover new characters, enhance your powers and shape your destiny with every loop. Will you break free or become part of the cycle forever?

Gameplay

AUTO ATTACKS

Embrace and master your character's innate auto-attacks.

Upgrade your weapons between loops to match your preferred playstyle.

DASHES

Unleash frenetic dashes to weave through hordes.

Enhance their power and effects as you progress, creating dynamic synergies with your build.

Features

  • Fast-Paced Runs: Complete intense and rewarding runs in under 15 minutes.

  • Build Variety: Experiment with scaling builds using weapons, dashes, and upgrades.

  • Multiple Characters: Unlock and discover X characters, each with their own characteristics.

  • Unique Items: Choose between X celestial artifacts.

  • Handcrafted Visuals: Dive into an immersive 2.5D celestial world.

  • Accessibility Options: Tailor your own experience.

short_description: Trapped in a timeloop with no memories, you are the Light Bearer, fighting to uncover the truth - but at what cost? Harness rhytmic auto-attacks and dashes as light fades around you, raising tension with every move. Shape your power, rewrite your path, and embrace eternity or break free.
